
public class LeapYear {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		
		
		
		
		int LeapYers;
		
		LeapYers = 2004;
		
		if (LeapYers %100 != 0 && LeapYers% 4 == 0)
		{
			System.out.print("Leap yers");
		}
		else
		{
			System.out.print("Not Leap yers");
		}
		
		
		

	}

}
